comment_text: Sorry, I thumbs down every video I watch now. With out the counter it seems like there is no consequences.
True, I don’t listen to the news anymore !! Very seldom..

Hi Sadie.:)
That’s really true. I don’t listen to news anymore.
Awful video. Probably the worst in the whole (otherwise pretty amazing) series.
God designed it that way? Along with dental decay, brain cancer, diabetes, guinea worms, malaria, typhoons, earthquakes, tsunamis?

I have to say, you're probably the only channel I'm subscribed to who regularly quotes the bible. While I'm not a Christian, atheist, agnostic or a member of any other organized or unorganized religion, the way that you present the actual material in your video is not only entertaining, but the material itself is accurate. I see no problem with you expressing your beliefs as long as it is short and doesn't conflict or alter the actual subject matter of the video, which you do very well.
It's pretty short sighted to lose respect for an obviously intelligent person just because they believe in religion. If you go by that belief, you're going to find yourself alienated very quickly.
It's pretty funny that people are angry over the quotation of the bible. It seems to me that they're being even more preachy than they claim Christians are. Live and let live, guys.
Some of life's most important lessons are learned through suffering. It's what makes us strong and gives us wisdom.
i think you are a cool dad! and make cool video's :)
Don't let the haters bother you. I say stay strong in your beliefs because you are allowed to express them here in America! God bless you and keep up with the great videos!
Only true southerners wear Costa Del Mar and not Oakley( im not saying Oakley is bad, I love Oakleys military gear)... Thats awesome even your daughter is wearing Costa's.
I see a lot of comments about religion and what not but you're an amazing father and watching you with your daughter is amazing. Whatever you're doing you're doing it right.
I recently found your channel and watched many of your videos. I am deeply disappointed to now find out that you buy into religion. *Unsubscribed*
acu patterned sunhat. must be ex army

@elvee88 Why even make a comment that you know isn't going to be accepted or appreciated?  I'm an agnostic as well, but this is Destin's channel and frankly he can say what he wants.  I may not agree with his optimism about the planet's ability to recuperate from all we are doing to it, but he seems to be a guy whose heart is in the right place and is a kickass father.  We could do a lot worse than have more like him.

@elvee88 
But you see it's offensive to me that you're telling me that I can't openly express my views. By trying to not offend anybody, you are offending somebody. It is impossible to please everyone. Perhaps you should follow your own advice and "let it be": Allow people to express their views openly without trying to stifle them.

@elvee88 
Destin responded pretty effectively, but I'd also like to point out something that bothered me about your comment...What you are effectively saying to Destin is that he can't have his express his own beliefs; instead, he must conform his beliefs to yours.  What you're saying that that it's okay for somebody to discuss a topic as long as it "suits everyone." This flies in the face of religious freedom and freedom of speech.

Although I do not share the same spiritual beliefs as you, I'm not the bothered the first bit by you expressing your beliefs in your videos, and I know that even though a lot of the other viewers seem to problems with it, you won't allow that to change anything about your videos. For that, I respect you even more  than I did before. And on a side note, the footage of you and your daughter is so adorable I just want to bear hug the both of you! ^_^

You shouldn't mention God in your videos???? Seriously?  Some of these comments are rediculous.  I'm glad to see someone standing up for their beliefs!  Keep it up and God Bless : ) Matthew 5:10 Blessed are those who are persecuted for rightousness' sake, For theirs is the kingdom of Heaven

@elvee88 
I respect your point of view.  I also hope you respect that if I feel like I've rationally arrived at a way to live that helps others, brings joy to others, and contributes to an overall more peaceful society I should be allowed to share this.  I've discovered this through a man named Jesus.  Through rational thought I have concluded that his words are true.  I am a scientist, logic is important. I tell others about him every day through how I live.  Occasionally, I use words.  Peace.

@xrammyx 
Fair enough.  I should have said: "Overcoming adversity makes me a better person".
